Y0UR-U5ERNAME/actorSetCollisionBoxPlugin.description: Sets the collision box of an actor without having to change spritesheets.
Y0UR-U5ERNAME/actorSetCollisionBoxPlugin.author: Y0UR-U5ERNAME

Y0UR-U5ERNAME/advancedMathPlugin.description: Includes Square Root, Sine Scale, and Cosine Scale.
Y0UR-U5ERNAME/advancedMathPlugin.author: Y0UR-U5ERNAME

Y0UR-U5ERNAME/changeSceneNoFadePlugin.description: Changes the scene without fading, causing glitchy effects usually.
Y0UR-U5ERNAME/changeSceneNoFadePlugin.author: Y0UR-U5ERNAME

Y0UR-U5ERNAME/dialogueNameTagLargeAvatar.description: Allows a dialogue to have a name tag and/or a large avatar made of text.
Y0UR-U5ERNAME/dialogueNameTagLargeAvatar.author: Y0UR-U5ERNAME

Y0UR-U5ERNAME/getSystimePlugin.description: Stores the system time (the number of frames since game started running) inside a variable.
Y0UR-U5ERNAME/getSystimePlugin.author: Y0UR-U5ERNAME

Y0UR-U5ERNAME/masterVolumePlugin.description: Sets the master volume, affecting all music and sounds.
Y0UR-U5ERNAME/masterVolumePlugin.author: Y0UR-U5ERNAME

Y0UR-U5ERNAME/setMusicPosPlugin.description: Sets the music position (you can currently only set the pattern number).
Y0UR-U5ERNAME/setMusicPosPlugin.author: Y0UR-U5ERNAME

Y0UR-U5ERNAME/setPaletteColorsPlugin.description: Sets each of the individual colors of either the DMG or GBC palettes.
Y0UR-U5ERNAME/setPaletteColorsPlugin.author: Y0UR-U5ERNAME

Y0UR-U5ERNAME/transferSGBPacketPlugin.description: Transfers SGB packets for accessing SGB features.
Y0UR-U5ERNAME/transferSGBPacketPlugin.author: Y0UR-U5ERNAME

Y0UR-U5ERNAME/whileLoopPlugin.description: Runs the following code as long as the condition is true.
Y0UR-U5ERNAME/whileLoopPlugin.author: Y0UR-U5ERNAME

datguywitha3ds/MaxSFX.description: This is a mod of Maximum SFX to be compatible with GB Studio 3.1's new sound driver, it should work the same once you drop it in the plugins folder.
datguywitha3ds/MaxSFX.author: datguywitha3ds

datguywitha3ds/P82Toxa.description: This plugin takes a PICO-8 sound effect clipboard string and translates it to the GB Studio 3.1 sound driver.
datguywitha3ds/P82Toxa.author: datguywitha3ds

pau-tomas/AdvancedDialogue.description: Show a advanced dialogue box at the bottom of the game screen.
pau-tomas/AdvancedDialogue.author: pau-tomas

pau-tomas/AdvancedMenu.description: Display a menu of multiple options and set the specified variable to the value of the chosen option.
pau-tomas/AdvancedMenu.author: pau-tomas

pau-tomas/BackgroundText.description: Renders a line of text at a specified position in the scene background.
pau-tomas/BackgroundText.author: pau-tomas

pau-tomas/CameraFields.description: Store or change the value of a Camera Field.
pau-tomas/CameraFields.author: pau-tomas

pau-tomas/MuteChannel.description: Mutes one or more channels for the currently playing music.
pau-tomas/MuteChannel.author: pau-tomas

pau-tomas/PlayerField.description: Store the value of a Player Field in a variable.
pau-tomas/PlayerField.author: pau-tomas

pau-tomas/PrintScreenBackground.description: Prints the visible background of the current scene using GB Printer.
pau-tomas/PrintScreenBackground.author: pau-tomas

pau-tomas/RealTimeClock.description: A set of events that give access to the Real Time Clock functionality present in some GB cartridges.
pau-tomas/RealTimeClock.author: pau-tomas

pau-tomas/SmoothFade.description: Fade some or all of the current scene's background or sprites palettes to or from a white or black screen, interpolating the color values for a smooth fade.
pau-tomas/SmoothFade.author: pau-tomas

dochardware/MaximumSFX.description: This plugin allows you to input hex values for a wider range of sound effects with a single event than the normal Play Sound event will let you.
dochardware/MaximumSFX.author: dochardware

CCC200/MiniVariables16.description: With this plugin you can break each variable into smallers sets of 2/4/8-bit variables to save on space.
CCC200/MiniVariables16.author: CCC200
